Verses: 1 pinpu Mose Movaapin Samanaana Veligalilirundhu Erigovukku Edhiraana Nebo Malaiyilirukkum Pisgaavin Kodumudiyil Erinaan; Appozhudhu Karththar Avanukku, Thaanmattumulla Keeleyaath Dhesam Anaiththaiyum,
2 napdhali Dhesam Anaiththaiyum, Eppiraayeem Manaase Enbavargalin Dhesaththaiyum, Kadaisich Samuththiramvaraikkumulla Yoodhaa Dhesam Anaiththaiyum,
3 thenpuraththaiyum, Sovaarvaraikkumulla Pereechchamarangalin Pattanam Ennum Oormudharkondu Erigovin Pallaththaakkaagiya Samanaana Boomiyaiyum Kaanbiththaar.

4 appozhudhu Karththar Avanai Nokki: Naan Ungal Sandhadhikkuk Koduppen Endru Aabiragaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Yaakkobukkum Aanaiyitta Dhesam Idhudhaan, Idhai Un Kan Kaanumbadi Seydhen; Aanaalum Avvidaththirkuk Kadandhupovadhillai Endraar.
5 appadiye Karththarin Dhaasanaagiya Mose Movaap Dhesamaana Avvidaththile Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinbadiye Mariththaan.
6 avar Avanai Movaap Dhesaththilulla Pedhpeyorukku Edhiraana Pallaththaakkile Adakkampanninaar. Innaalvaraikkum Oruvanum Avan Piredhakkuzhiyai Ariyaan.
7 mose Marikkirapodhu Nootrirupathuvayadhaayirundhaan; Avan Kan Iruladaiyavumillai, Avan Belan Kuraiyavumillai.
8 isravel Puththirar Movaapin Samanaana Veligalil Mosekkaaga Muppadhu Naal Azhudhukondirundhaargal; Mosekkaaga Azhudhu Thukkangondaadina Naatgal Mudindhadhu.

9 mose Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavinmel Than Kaigalai Vaiththabadiyinaal Avan Gnaanaththin Aaviyinaal Niraiyappattaan; Isravel Puththirar Avanukkuk Keezhppadindhu, Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye Seydhaargal.

10 mose Egipthudhesaththile Paarvonukkum, Avanudaiya Ellaa Oozhiyakkaararukkum, Avanudaiya Dhesamanaiththirkum Seyyumbadi Karththar Avanai Anuppich Seyviththa Sagala Adaiyaalangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum,
11 avan Isravelar Ellaarukkum Piraththiyatchamaaich Seydha Sagala Vallamaiyaana Kiriyaigalaiyum, Magaa Bayangaramaana Seygaigalaiyum Paarththaal,
12 karththarai Mugamugamaai Arindha Moseyaippola, Oru Theerkkadharisiyum Isravelil Appuram Ezhumbinadhillai Endru Vilangum.
